titleStmt.title: The dignitie of man both in the perfections of his soule and bodie. Shewing as well the faculties in the disposition of the one: as the senses and organs, in the composition of the other. By A.N.
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde dwelling vppon Lambert-hill, neere old fish-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
